TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. However, the only creature you can make is a chicken.

I wish it was easier to beares.

Granted. It is now easier to attract bears. Giant bears.

I wish I Chekhov's Gun was used appropriately in modern-day movies.

(Chekhov's Gun is where a seemingly insignificant scene early in the story becomes critical to the plot later on.)

Granted. But movie studios become concerned only with revenue, letting aesthetic sense, interesting and well written plots and cultural value aside, thus making petty movies Oh, wait...

I wish Stanley Kubrick had survived to directed A.I. Artificial Intelligence.

Granted, but he died just a few days after shooting began, and they had to cast a new director.

I wish people in movies aren't so stupid when it comes to action scenes...

Granted. But they're stupid when it comes to dialogue scenes.

I wish someone makes a KSP stop motion movie.

granted. brought to you by the creators of sweetbro and hella jeff

I wish that polan can into space
Granted, but you are executed by a Grammar Fascist for horrific grammar.

The wish is missing, so you get a pie.

I wish that bio fought his evil twin, oib!

Granted, but he kills bio and destroys NYC.

I wish the moon was made of ice cream.

Granted. One of the apollo missions takes home a scoop of it and it makes the astronauts sick when they eat it.

I wish that there was a new KSP Planet!

Granted, but KSP is now a F2P game and you have to pay Ã‚Â£99,99 for it.

I wish all people in the world would have access to a good quality education system.

Granted, but earth is destroyed by a Kerbal attack cruiser.

I wish Laythe had more land.

Granted. It is now larger than the observable universe, and there's no way any computer could process that.

I wish it was 70 degrees.

Granted. It is seventy degrees Celsius. Are you happier now?

I wish I was less tired.

Granted, but you can't sleep for the rest of your life.

I wish warp drives existed.

Granted, driving now warps the glass on the windscreen (or whatever it's called in America).

I wish someone would crowd-fund a moonbase.

Granted, but the events of Moonbase Alpha take place (including the terrible text-to-speech system)\

I wish my Eve landers worked.

Granted. Some heavy "lithobraking" is rquired, but you're an expert at that.

I wish my Steam download was faster.

Granted. The load is down on your neck, slave.

Music player 4 .ogg files AND .mp3 files pls

Granted, but the only things it can play are annoying songs and nails on a chalkboard.

I wish Moho had an atmosphere.

granted, the atmosphere s denser than Eve and due to its proximity to Kol it continously ignite and burns turning it into a fireball

i wish that i could plan maneuvers better

Granted, but the maneuvers you make and execute are constantly interrupted by the kraken.

I wish that spring would come earlier.

Granted. It comes two seconds earlier than it normally would've.

I wish that these people next to me would be a little more quiet.

Granted. However, they reach the "perfect sound amount" and their voices are suddenly amplified to Planet-Cracking level.

I wish I could crack planets with air vibrations from my mouth.

Granted. Your Thu'um becomes so powerful that your jaw shatters. A nice image for you there.

I wish I had a thu'um.
